alert_error: An error occurred. Check the console for more information.

authentication.alert_missing_credentials: Please fill in both password and username fields.
authentication.alert_user_not_found: The user could not be found.

login.alert_wrong_credentials: Incorrect login credentials. Please try again.

logged-in-homepage.alert_error_path_parameter_invalid: The classification item you were in could not be found. You have been redirected back to the categories.

categories.alert_create_category_first: You haven't created any categories yet.
categories.alert_parameter_subcategoryId_invalid: The categoryId is less than or equal to 0.
categories.alert_category_not_found: The selected category could not be found.
categories.confirm_delete_category: Are you sure you want to delete this category? This action cannot be undone. You will lose all subcategories and entries belonging to this category.

create-category.alert_create_category_missing_fields: You must provide a name for the category and select a colour

update-category.alert_category_not_found: Selected category could not be found.

subcategories.ui_text_your_subcategories: Your subcategories belonging to the category with the following Id:
subcategories.alert_create_subcategory_first: You haven't created a subcategory yet.
subcategories.alert_parameter_subcategoryId_invalid: The subcategoryId is less than or equal to 0.

subcategories.confirm_delete_subcategory: Are you sure you want to delete this subcategory? This action cannot be undone. You will lose all entries belonging to this subcategory.

create-subcategory.alert_create_subcategory_missing_fields: You must provide a name for the subcategory and select a colour

update-subcategory.alert_subcategory_not_found: Selected subcategory could not be found.

entries.ui_text_your_entries: Your entries belonging to the subcategory with the following Id:
entries.alert_no_entries_found: You need to create an entry first.
entries.alert_parameter_entryId_invalid: The entryId is less than or equal to 0.
entries.alert_entry_not_found: The selected entry could not be found.
entries.confirm_delete_entry: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.

create-entry.alert_create_entry_missing_fields: You must provide the amount and the time of the entry.

update-entry.alert_entry_not_found: Selected entry could not be found.

labels.alert_create_label_first: You haven't created any labels yet.
labels.confirm_delete_label: Are you sure you want to delete this label? This action cannot be undone.
labels.alert_parameter_subcategoryId_invalid: The labelId is less than or equal to 0.
labels.alert_label_not_found: The chosen label could not be found.

create-label.alert_create_label_missing_fields: You must provide a name for the label and select a colour.

update-label.alert_label_not_found: Selected label could not be found.

label-entries.ui_text_your_label_entries: Your entries associated with the label with the following Id:

label-entries.console_error_fetching_label_for_entry: Error fetching labels for the entry with the id

label-entries.alert_no_entries_for_label: You need to add this label to an entry first.
label-entries.console_error_fetching_entries_for_label: Error fetching entries for this label:

user.alert_confirm_delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. You will lose all categories, subcategories, entries and labels.
